name: Coastal Flood Exposure Mapper
descripton: This tool provide a preliminary look at exposure to common types of coastal flooding. The viewer is a screening-level tool that uses nationally consistent data sets and analyses and should be used as such. Data and maps provided can be used at several scales to help gauge impacts and prioritize actions, but should be verified with a site visit.

name: Sea Level Rise Viewer
descripton: This tool provides a look at how sea level rise would affect the costal area in and around Charleston. With a changeable slide you can view what parts of the area would be flooded if sea level were to rise a given amount
